html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10082024-09-16PMO
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAmendments to the Composition of the Treasury Board
PrecisOrder (1) terminating the nominations made by Order in Council P.C. 2023-955 of September 25, 2023; (2) nominating the Members of the King's Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the TREASURY BOARD; (3) nominating the Members of the King's Privy Council for Canada to be alternates to serve in their place; (4) declaring that three members of the Treasury Board constitute a quorum.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order (1) terminating the nominations made by Order in Council P.C. 2023-955 of September 25, 2023; (2) nominating the Members of the King's Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the TREASURY BOARD; (3) nominating the Members of the King's Privy Council for Canada to be alternates to serve in their place; (4) declaring that three members of the Treasury Board constitute a quorum.
